mapper.select: SELECT TF.F_FDCODE, ET.E_NTTILTE , (SELECT SC.SUB_NAME FROM TR_MASTERCODE MC INNER JOIN TR_SUBCODE SC ON SC.MS_CODE = MC.MS_CODE WHERE MC.MS_CODE = ET.MS_CODE AND SC.SUB_CODE = ET.E_DISCOUNT) AS DISCOUNT_VALUE , ET.E_STARTDATE, SYSDATE AS TODAY, ET.E_ENDDATE , (SELECT TR_FOODCODE.FC_CTGNAME FROM TR_FOODCODE WHERE FC_1ST=1 AND FC_2ND=0 AND FC_3RD=0) AS NAME1ST , (SELECT TR_FOODCODE.FC_CTGNAME FROM TR_FOODCODE WHERE FC_1ST=1 AND FC_2ND=TF.FC_2ND AND FC_3RD=0) AS NAME2ND , (SELECT TR_FOODCODE.FC_CTGNAME FROM TR_FOODCODE WHERE FC_1ST=1 AND FC_2ND=TF.FC_2ND AND FC_3RD=TF.FC_3RD) AS NAME3RD , TF.F_FOODNAME , TF.F_PRICE , TB.B_AMOUNT , TF.F_ISBLOCK , TF.f_thumname , (SELECT SC.SUB_NAME FROM TR_MASTERCODE MC INNER JOIN TR_SUBCODE SC ON SC.MS_CODE = MC.MS_CODE WHERE MC.MS_CODE = TF.MS_CODE AND SC.SUB_CODE = TF.F_ISBLOCK) AS F_ISBLOCKNAME FROM TR_BASKET TB INNER JOIN TR_FOOD TF ON TB.F_FDCODE = TF.F_FDCODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TR_EVENT ET ON TF.E_EVTCODE = ET.E_EVTCODE WHERE M_USERID= #{m_userid}
mapper.delete: delete from tr_basket where m_userid = #{m_userid} and f_fdcode = #{f_fdcode}
